mapper.update: UPDATE goal SET title = #{title}, description = #{description}, category_id = #{categoryId}, priority = #{priority}, deadline = #{deadline}, progress = #{progress}, status = #{status}, image_url = #{imageUrl}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, title, description, category_id, priority, deadline, progress, status, image_url, create_time, update_time FROM goal WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, user_id, title, description, category_id, priority, deadline, progress, status, image_url, create_time, update_time FROM goal WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY update_time DESC

SELECT id, user_id, title, description, category_id, priority, deadline, progress, status, image_url, create_time, update_time FROM goal WHERE category_id = #{categoryId} AND user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY update_time DESC

SELECT g.id, g.user_id, g.title, g.description, g.category_id, g.priority, g.deadline, g.progress, g.status, g.image_url, g.create_time, g.update_time FROM goal g INNER JOIN reminder r ON g.id = r.goal_id WHERE g.user_id = #{userId} AND DATE(r.remind_time) = #{date} AND g.status != 'completed' ORDER BY r.remind_time ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM goal WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND status = 'completed'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM goal WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND status <> 'abandoned'
